data.title: React Basic
data.short_des: This 5-part video course with interactive code examples that will help you learn React.
data.description: Software Engineers who use React every day explain what React is, when you might use it and why. We take a look at a simple app that uses React, and we introduce the tools and concepts you need to understand it, including Webpack, JSX, components, elements and props.We introduce you to routing, and explain how you can use React Router to add links to additional pages in your app.
